column3: ACK. I'm not sure if anyone actually was testing on Vista but I think it's reasonable to drop in any case.\n\nArbitrary sample - w3schools.com (https://www.w3schools.com/browsers/browsers_os.asp) shows 0.1% usage share for Vista and 0.5% for XP vs >25% for Windows 7.
ACK I doubt anyone tests on Vista, Sounds sensible to me.
